    • Method Detail

      • setNotSet

        public static boolean setNotSet(org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection section,
                                java.lang.String path,
                                java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the specified path to the given value if and only if it is not already set.

        If value is null, the entry will be removed. Any existing entry will be replaced, regardless of what the new value is.

        Some implementations may have limitations on what you may store. See their individual javadocs for details. No implementations should allow you to store Configuration or ConfigurationSection, please use ConfigurationSection.createSection(java.lang.String) for that.

        Parameters:
        section - Configuration section to set
        path - Path of the object to set
        value - Value to set the path to
        Returns:
        true if set successfully, else false

      • setNotEqual

        public static boolean setNotEqual(org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection section,
                                  java.lang.String path,
                                  java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the specified path to the given value if and only if it the value at the provided path is not the same as value.

        If value is null, the entry will be removed. Any existing entry will be replaced, regardless of what the new value is.

        Some implementations may have limitations on what you may store. See their individual javadocs for details. No implementations should allow you to store Configuration or ConfigurationSection, please use ConfigurationSection.createSection(java.lang.String) for that.

        Parameters:
        section - Configuration section to set
        path - Path of the object to set
        value - Value to set the path to
        Returns:
        true if set successfully, else false

      • createNotExisting

        public static org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection createNotExisting(org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection section,
                                                                              java.lang.String name)
        Creates an empty ConfigurationSection within the specified ConfigurationSection if and only if there is no another section with the same name as the provided.

        Parameters:
        section - Section at which the new section will be created
        name - Name for the section
        Returns:
        Newly created section, or the already existing section

      • getSubSections

        public static java.util.Set<org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection> getSubSections(org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection section)
        Gets the ConfigurationSection within the desired ConfigurationSection (sub-sections of the desired section).

        Parameters:
        section - ConfigurationSection where the sub-sections are stored
        Returns:
        Sub-sections of the desired section

      • alternatePathSeparator

        public static java.lang.String alternatePathSeparator(java.lang.String key,
                                                      char path_separator,
                                                      char alt_char)
        Replaces the desired character that is used as path separator by the specified alt_char.

        Parameters:
        key - Key that contains the separator to replace
        path_separator - Path separator to replace
        alt_char - Path separator to use instead the current one
        Returns:
        Key containing the new path separator

      • alternatePathSeparator

        public static java.lang.String alternatePathSeparator(java.lang.String key,
                                                      char alt_char)
        Replaces the common path separator '.' by the specified alt_char.

        Parameters:
        key - Key that contains the common separator to replace
        alt_char - Path separator to use instead the common one
        Returns:
        Key containing the new path separator
